Aetheria.name: Aetheria
Aetheria.description: A mysterious location, perhaps shrouded in nebula or ancient secrets.

Cosmic Core.name: Cosmic Core
Cosmic Core.description: A central hub teeming with activity, likely a major trade or political center.

Outlaw's Haven.name: Outlaw's Haven
Outlaw's Haven.description: A shadowy refuge on the fringes, known for its black markets and questionable clientele.

Quantara.name: Quantara
Quantara.description: Likely a world known for its technological advancements or scientific pursuits.

Frontier's Edge.name: Frontier's Edge
Frontier's Edge.description: A rugged, barely-tamed system on the edge of explored space. Resources are scarce, but opportunities exist for the bold.

Sovereign Reach.name: Sovereign Reach
Sovereign Reach.description: A heavily fortified system, the heart of a major political or military power. Access may be restricted.
